response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to share this unique piece with someone who appreciates its true worth. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
